skill.name: Level Augmentation
skill.description:
Can be used when your Life Points are 3000 or lower, by revealing 1 monster card in your hand and selecting 1 monster on your field.
The selected monster's Level will increase by the Level of the monster you revealed until the end of the turn. This Skill can only be used once per Duel.

linkedArticle.description: Everything you need to know about farming Leo. His decklists, card rewards, top level farm decks with strategy information and free to play card replacements. This article will help you farm Leo as efficiently as possible.
linkedArticle.title: How to Farm Leo

children.content: Leo will appear at the gate at stage 10 in Duel World (5D's)
keys to duel at the gate
Leo's unlock missions will appear upon reaching stage 11 in Duel World (5D's)
Achieve 1 'Quick Victory' against Leo at level 20 using
Use equip Spell cards 3 times in Duel World (5D's).

skill.name: The Tie that Binds
skill.description: Until the end of your turn, the ATK of all face-up monsters on your field increases by the number of monsters on your field times 100. This Skill can only be used once per turn.

linkedArticle.description: Everything you need to know about farming Yugi Muto efficiently! His decklists, card rewards, top level farm decks with strategy information and free to play card replacements.

Yugi Muto appears at the gate at Stage 13 (DM)
Yugi Muto level 40 appears at the gate upon reaching stage 30
is a staple card needed for most farming decks

skill.name: Destiny Draw
skill.description: Can be used when your Life Points decrease by 2000. In the Draw Phase, instead of conducting your normal draw, draw a card of your choice. This Skill can only be used once per Duel.

linkedArticle.description: Everything you need to know about farming Yami Yugi efficiently! His decklists, card rewards, top level farm decks with strategy information and free to play card replacements.
linkedArticle.title: How to Farm Yami Yugi

children.content: keys to duel at the gate
He appears at the gate at Stage 15 (unless chosen as your starting character)
Yami Yugi Level 40 appears at the gate upon reaching Stage 30
Pick as a starter character (or reach Stage 15 in DM Duel World if you choose
Use a Spell Card 5 time(s) in one Duel.
and win 1 Duel(s) against Yami Yugi at level 30 in Duel World.

skill.name: Level Augmentation
skill.description:
Can be used when your Life Points are 3000 or lower, by revealing 1 monster card in your hand and selecting 1 monster on your field.
The selected monster's Level will increase by the Level of the monster you revealed until the end of the turn. This Skill can only be used once per Duel.

skill.name: Ultimate Dragons
skill.description:
At the beginning of the Duel, add 'Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon', 'Neo Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon', and 'Blue-Eyes Twin Burst Dragon' to your Extra Deck.
Can be used on turn 3 and onward by revealing 2 'Blue-Eyes White Dragon' in your hand to your opponent. Add 'Polymerization' to your hand from outside of your Deck.
This Skill can only be used once per Duel.

skill.name: Level Tuning
skill.description: Can be used if your Life Points are at 2000 or below. Select 2 monsters on your side of the field and declare a monster level between 1 and 4. The selected monsters' levels will be equal to the number you declared. This Skill can only be used once per Duel.
